text: @realDonaldTrump RT!! WTH?? The NIH abruptly cut off funding to a long-standing, well-regarded research project on coronaviruses only AFTER THE WHITE HOUSE SPECIFICALLY TOLD IT TO DO SO, according to Dr. Anthony Fauci, dir of the NIH’s Allergy and Infectious Diseases https://t.co/q4oPxBFYbP
